title: Strengthening Programming Practical Skills: Flexible Learning Design for Enhanced Accessibility and Inclusivity in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more educational scenarios reflecting cultural and physical diversity using the FLeD Tool
Learners conduct PBL projects incorporating support strategies for learners with disabilities, based on Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles
Learners can perform peer feedback five or more times using smartphone-based assessment tools in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
